About Me

Is currently working as a technology consultant, in web and mobile projects involving Ruby on Rails, and Asterisk PBX.

He has consulted for several early-stage startups in Silicon Valley, and in Paris, France - both for technological development, and architectural planning.

He studied Physics and Math as an undergrad at MIT, and then research in the Cognitive Neuroscience lab of Yuhong Jiang at Harvard University.

He then moved to Paris, France, there obtaining a PhD in Quantum Optics from the University of Paris VI, as well as a Diplome dâ€™Ingenieur, from the Ecole des Mines de Paris.
